ingredients: 3 lb chicken, skinless and preferably bone in (any kind will do. I have used 6-8 medium sized drumsticks here)
3. 1 – 2 teaspoon red chili powder (I use Kashmiri chili powder which has deep red color but less heat)
2. 7 cups fresh chopped/baby leaf spinach (+ 1  cup loosely packed fresh cilantro if you are not in favor of the flavor of spinach. This is optional)
9. 6-8 cloves of garlic (a little less than 1/4 cup)
10. 5-6 hot green chili pepper (if you do not like the heat, remove seeds and membranes. be careful and use gloves to de seed)
12. 3 medium tomatoes (2 cups blended/pureed/grated with no water added)
15. 1 tablespoon kasoori methi (dried methi/fenugreek leaves – available in Indian/Pakistani grocery store) – Optional
16. 1.5 teaspoon garam masala powder (homemade or store bought)
17. fresh lemon juice to sprinkle as garnish
18. 1 inch fresh ginger, peeled and julienned
